LanguageData.Estate_Refrigerator.label: Refrigerator
LanguageData.Estate_Refrigerator.description: Meals stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Estate_RoundTable.label: round table (1x1)
LanguageData.Estate_RoundTable.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.Estate_Telegraph.label: telegraph
LanguageData.Estate_Telegraph.description: The telegraph allows communication with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.Estate_Telescope.label: fancy telescope
LanguageData.Estate_Telescope.description: A fancy telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing and fun hobby for a certain kind of person.
LanguageData.WoodStoveFurnace.label: wood stove furnace
LanguageData.WoodStoveFurnace.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Runs out of fuel after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
